Description: monday.com is a cloud-based Work OS, where teams create workflow apps in minutes to run their processes, projects, and everyday work.
Name: monday.com

Methods.Name: List Group Items
Methods.Description: Retrieves all items belonging to a specified group.

Methods.Name: List Groups
Methods.Description: List all groups belonging to this board.

Methods.Name: Get Group
Methods.Description: Retrieves a single group by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Group Items
Methods.Description: Retrieves new items belonging to a specified group.

Methods.Name: List New Activity Logs
Methods.Description: Returns a collection of activity logs in a specific board.

Methods.Name: List Activity Logs
Methods.Description: Returns a collection of activity logs in a specific board.

Methods.Name: List Updated Items
Methods.Description: Lists items on the board since modified the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List New Items
Methods.Description: Lists items added to the board since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Update Item
Methods.Description: Update an Item on the board.

Methods.Name: Create Item
Methods.Description: Create a new Item in the board.

Methods.Name: Get Item
Methods.Description: Retrieves a single item by ID.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: List all of users which are part of an account (i.e an organization).

Methods.Name: List New Users
Methods.Description: List all of users which are part of an account (i.e an organization).

Methods.Name: Get Team
Methods.Description: Retrieves a single team by ID.
